function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 facilitated by connectivity","Impact":"High risk of cross-border infections and impact on large metropolitan areas","Mitigation":"Restrictions on movement, enhanced border controls, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine development, and data analytics for tracking spread","People":"Residents of large metropolitan areas, tourists, businesspeople","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Economic impact of high unemployment and social distancing","Impact":"Societal, economic, and political impacts","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus, social support programs, and job creation initiatives","Technologies":"Remote work technologies, digital payment systems, and economic forecasting tools","People":"Unemployed individuals, communities, policymakers","Owner":"Government, economic institutions"},{"Description":"Environmental impacts from changed behaviors and economic recovery","Impact":"Positive and negative environmental impacts","Mitigation":"Green recovery investments, sustainable infrastructure development, and environmental regulation","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, emissions monitoring systems, and sustainable urban planning tools","People":"Environmental activists, communities, policymakers","Owner":"Environmental agencies, policymakers"}]}
